articles.summary: It seemed Ruben Loftus-Cheek was heading to the door in January. articles.title: GdS: Allegri, Maignan and more – Milan seeking revenge in many ways
articles.summary: After last season, there are several players seeking revenge at AC Milan. However, there are also some who don’t have the burden of last year weighing on them. articles.summary: AC Milan got three points against Pisa on Friday night, but it certainly wasn’t easy and Massimiliano Allegri had a few things to say to his squad after.  Above all, it is a win for Milan against a newly promoted side. It feels strange to be celebrating that in February. However, it has troubled the

articles.title: Chivu references Milan’s advantage in Scudetto race after Juventus win: “We were naive”
articles.summary: It is no secret that Inter are leading the Scudetto race by an almost uncatchable margin currently, but AC Milan are not out of it.  There has been a lot said about the Scudetto this season, but in Milan’s context, it has normally been a case of hoping, rather than expecting. articles.title: Leao offers support to Füllkrug off the pitch after Pisa act – his new role for Milan
